name: Tetris Royale
description:
Your task in this game is to destroy the house by placing the blocks in the empty spaces to fill the space, then you will destroy 1 floor, which means you get points.

The gameplay is similar to other Tetris games but the special thing about this game is the control, the pre-mapped blocks indicate the location where you will place the building blocks, besides the game also gives you countless good background music suitable for you to relax and Gamepad Support Mode

With the above elements, it will be an interesting game for you to add to your favorite game collection
